Title: Prohibits the use of pentachlorophenol with regard to new or existing transmission utility poles or facilities
Summary: Prohibits the use of pentachlorophenol with regard to new or existing transmission utility poles or facilities.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 9 §§37-0901 - 37-0905, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of pentachlorophenol with regard to new or existing transmission utility poles or facilities
